column5: About a year ago my husband was having breathing problems and many prescriptions later... He went to many Doctors and finally found some good ones. We found out today, after being there last week, he will need to have surgery Monday. So far, it will just be day surgery and a biopsy, so he gets to come home that day..... Right now all we know is he has a growth in the nasal/sinus passage, which is bleeding down into his lungs. As a small child he had to have all of that area reconstructed due to damage from birth process.  Right now I am trying to be supportive and tell him we can only take one day at a time.... Only God knows what tomorrow will bring.....  Thanx, I will let you know what happens.... Lorissa
You can count on me to send a prayer up for you both !!
I hope all goes well.   I'll be rooting for him.  Pam
You will be in my thoughts on Monday... hope it all goes well.  Jen
We'll be thinking of the two of you!  ccmt and bly
I'll have him in my thoughts and wish him a successful and speedy recovery!
My thoughts and prayers are with your husband, yourself and your family. Be strong.
Thoughts and prayers are with you.  Keep us posted on his progress. Take care and stay strong.
Consider a prayer being said! In our thoughts!  Easton
I've asked for help for you and yours...
Our thoughts and prayers are with you..
For sure...thoughts, prayers and more prayers.  I have always found this saying to be quite reassuring..."Be still and know that I am God"  Nancy
Hope all goes well...be sayin a few for ya!
Thank you all!...Chrome Hen that is Psalms 46:10..... Plus he and I have alot of fishing to do! Took me a short while to rope that man and then brand him....So he isn't going anywhere yet!  Lorissa

You got another one Lorissa.  Hope everything goes very well.  Alos pray that the biopsy will advise the doctors as what's going on and theat is can be easily and permanently treated.   The two of you will not be alone tomorrow ... we never are.
Prayers are sent Lorissa. Hoping the big guy is listening.
